scripts.clean:ios: cd ios && xcodebuild clean -workspace RNIFKTest.xcworkspace -configuration Debug -scheme RNIFKTest -derivedDataPath build
scripts.infer:ios: cd ios && infer --fail-on-issue -- xcodebuild -workspace RNIFKTest.xcworkspace -configuration Debug -scheme RNIFKTest -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=12.1,name=iPhone 7' -derivedDataPath build
